title: Mojo
description: ***This novelette is also available in M Jet's dark erotic collection, Dark Desires***Simone Miller is happily married to her high school sweet heart, Desmond. With two young kids living in a lovely home in suburbia as a stay at home mom, Simone has it all. But like so many women, giving birth takes its toll on her and she doesn't feel like herself. Find out how this seemingly "boring" married couple gets their mojo back and returns to the wild that works for them! An explicit, erotic romance short story, about how one couple uses romance and sex to keep their marriage on fire.Includes and excerpt from another erotica story from M Jet!Not suitable for all audiences.
author: M. Jet
